snippet: The screening test for colon cancer uses patients’ DNA to help spot potentially deadly tumors and growths.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves first screening test for colon cancer that uses patients’ DNA to help spot potentially deadly tumors and growths.
lead_paragraph: The screening test for colon cancer uses patients’ DNA to help spot potentially deadly tumors and growths.

headline.main: F.D.A. Clears Cancer Test That Uses Patients’ DNA
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Clears Cancer Test That Uses Patients’ DNA
